section.title: Allergies

text.paragraph: Incision and Drainage of Deep Supralevator, Pelvirectal, or Retrorectal Abscess
Incision and Drainage of Ischiorectal and/or Perirectal Abscess

item.content: TAKE ONE-HALF TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY DAY
INSERT ONE SUPPOSITORY IN RECTUM DAILY
TAKE ONE TEASPOONFUL BY MOUTH EVERY DAY FOR 7 DAYS
TAKE 400 MILLIGRAMS BY MOUTH THREE TIMES A DAY WITH FOOD FOR 7 DAYS
TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH DAILY
TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH AND 1 AT BEDTIME
TAKE ONE-HALF TABLET BY MOUTH DAILY
TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH EVERY EVENING
TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH DAILY
TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH DAILY
TAKE ONE TABLET BY MOUTH 4 TIMES A DAY
